code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await fetch('http://to-do-list-1-i7w0.onrender.com/api/auth/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await response.json();if(response.ok){console.log('Login successful',data);localStorage.setItem('user',JSON.stringify(data));navigate('/todos');}else{console.error('Login error',data);alert(data.message||'Login failed');}}catch(error){console.error('Network error',error);alert('Network error');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Email:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,className:"form-input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Password:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,className:"form-input"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-button",children:"Login"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>navigate('/register'),className:"secondary-button",children:"Go to Register"})]});};export default Login;
